Black Fatally Shot: US Census ACS 5-year estimates (or 1-year for most recent). Look for 'one race white' and 'one race black or African American'

Year: Police Contacts / Traffic Stops / Street Stops
Black Fatally Shot: Bureau of Justice Statistics Police-Public Contact Survey (PPCS). Note: Survey conducted every 3 years. Use most recent available or average across waves.
FBI UCR Table 43A (Arrests by Race): https://ucr.fbi.gov/crime-in-the-u.s/
FBI UCR Table 43A - sum of murder, rape, robbery, aggravated assault arrests by race
FBI UCR Table 43A - 'Weapons; carrying, possessing, etc.' by race

Year: PPCS data is survey-based and only updated every 3 years (2011, 2015, 2018, etc). The 2015-2017 values above use averages from 2002-2011 waves per the original paper.
UCR data may have gaps due to agency non-participation. Check coverage notes in FBI reports.
For UCR, look for tables disaggregated by race - typically Table 43A or Table 21A depending on year.
